resources.string: Skal et barn bruge denne konto? Det kan være en god idé at aktivere %s.

Spil mod modstandere fra hele verden.

string.name: learnFromXAndY
string.comment:
%1$s is Study %2$s is Videos
They are both links to pages titled that way, and the title is used verbatim.

resources.string: Indstil Lichess, som du vil have det.
